message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $15,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $15,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but that's my final offer. I really need to stay within my budget.
